title: Introducing: VOW
content:
VOW, a duo out of LA comprised of Julia Blake (vocals) and Andrew Thomas, may have the best press shot of the year.

I really hope the cat is an official part of the band. Anyway, with their first release coming out in a few days time, an EP titled Make Me Young (which is available online already, however I’m not sure whether they intended it to be public, so I’ll refrain from embedding it for now), they’ve released the title track from the five song long release. Make Me Young is an electro-pop gem, not too dissimilar to the new wave, synth drive pop of buzz band CHVRCHES. Vocally, there’s comparisons likely to be drawn to everyone’s favourite pouty lipped princess, Lana Del Rey, with the reverb drenched, 60’s swoon of Julia Blake. Check out Make Me Young below, and keep your eyes peeled for their debut EP of the same title, out 13 August on digital download and 7″ vinyl.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
